room_title: Escape room "221B The Study" by Escape Goat in Orlando
review: This experience was a serious rush. I highly recommend the 221B experience. It was such an adrenaline rush for any fan of Sherlock or escape room junkie looking for a challenge. We certainly entered the world of our favorite detective, and I bow to those able to crack all the mental puzzles within the time allotted.Make sure your Mind Palace is prepared for this intense case!

room_title: Escape room "221B The Study" by Escape Goat in Orlando
review: As local Winter Garden/Ocoee residents our group is incredibly happy and lovingly welcome Escape Goat to the community. We did room 221b and it was brilliant- to say the least. Having only been to two other escape rooms, this was by far the best - and we loved the other two we did as well but this blew them out of the water. The puzzles in this room were inventive, fresh, different and thought-provoking. The owners are the loveliest of people and we can't wait to come back and visit them. Can't say enough good things.
